<Link id="l00001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1"><Highlight kind="comment">//===- CodeLayout.cpp - Implementation of code layout algorithms ----------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="2"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="3"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Part of the LLVM Project, under the Apache License v2.0 with LLVM Exceptions.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="4"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// See https://llvm.org/LICENSE.txt for license information.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="5"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// SPDX-License-Identifier: Apache-2.0 WITH LLVM-exception</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="6"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="7"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="8"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="9"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The file implements &quot;cache-aware&quot; layout algorithms of basic blocks and</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="10"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// functions in a binary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="11"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="12"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The algorithm tries to find a layout of nodes (basic blocks) of a given CFG</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="13"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// optimizing jump locality and thus processor I-cache utilization. This is</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="14"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// achieved via increasing the number of fall-through jumps and co-locating</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="15"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// frequently executed nodes together. The name follows the underlying</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="16"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// optimization problem, Extended-TSP, which is a generalization of classical</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="17"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// (maximum) Traveling Salesmen Problem.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="18"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="19"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The algorithm is a greedy heuristic that works with chains (ordered lists)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="20"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// of basic blocks. Initially all chains are isolated basic blocks. On every</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="21"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// iteration, we pick a pair of chains whose merging yields the biggest increase</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00022" /><CodeLine lineNumber="22"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// in the ExtTSP score, which models how i-cache &quot;friendly&quot; a specific chain is.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="23"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// A pair of chains giving the maximum gain is merged into a new chain. The</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00024" /><CodeLine lineNumber="24"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// procedure stops when there is only one chain left, or when merging does not</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00025" /><CodeLine lineNumber="25"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// increase ExtTSP. In the latter case, the remaining chains are sorted by</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// density in the decreasing order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// An important aspect is the way two chains are merged. Unlike earlier</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// algorithms (e.g., based on the approach of Pettis-Hansen), two</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// chains, X and Y, are first split into three, X1, X2, and Y. Then we</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// consider all possible ways of gluing the three chains (e.g., X1YX2, X1X2Y,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="32"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// X2X1Y, X2YX1, YX1X2, YX2X1) and choose the one producing the largest score.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="33"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This improves the quality of the final result (the search space is larger)</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="34"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// while keeping the implementation sufficiently fast.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="35"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="36"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Reference:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="37"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//   &#42; A. Newell and S. Pupyrev, Improved Basic Block Reordering,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="38"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     IEEE Transactions on Computers, 2020</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="39"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//     https://arxiv.org/abs/1809.04676</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="40"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="41"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//===----------------------------------------------------------------------===//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="42"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Epsilon for comparison of doubles.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#ab9e44545b673b6c107d44e7e2fa75727"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#ab9e44545b673b6c107d44e7e2fa75727">EPS</a> = 1e-8;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the Ext-TSP score for a given jump.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#acc82cef9cbd4dab51921209f2a1ac14b"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#acc82cef9cbd4dab51921209f2a1ac14b">jumpExtTSPScore</a>(uint64&#95;t JumpDist, uint64&#95;t JumpMaxDist, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><Highlight kind="normal">                       </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Weight) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (JumpDist &gt; JumpMaxDist)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Prob = 1 - </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(JumpDist) / JumpMaxDist;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Weight &#42; Prob &#42; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the Ext-TSP score for a jump between a given pair of blocks,</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// using their sizes, (estimated) addresses and the jump execution count.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a70ace5af72b93aedcb782ef65032c4de"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a70ace5af72b93aedcb782ef65032c4de">extTSPScore</a>(uint64&#95;t SrcAddr, uint64&#95;t SrcSize, uint64&#95;t DstAddr,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><Highlight kind="normal">                   uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">bool</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> IsConditional) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Fallthrough</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcAddr + SrcSize == DstAddr) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#acc82cef9cbd4dab51921209f2a1ac14b">jumpExtTSPScore</a>(0, 1, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><Highlight kind="normal">                           IsConditional ? <a href="#affece2ac80f379d7d409a19b3ed0aa2e">FallthroughWeightCond</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         : <a href="#ad029d20cd37f39d5567cddbbbacc220f">FallthroughWeightUncond</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Forward</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcAddr + SrcSize &lt; DstAddr) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t Dist = DstAddr - (SrcAddr + SrcSize);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#acc82cef9cbd4dab51921209f2a1ac14b">jumpExtTSPScore</a>(Dist, <a href="#a3f9f8ed4aa3937e607d43118dc83fa93">ForwardDistance</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><Highlight kind="normal">                           IsConditional ? <a href="#aef83fc9a3d17150b7f143b1b2e7ab041">ForwardWeightCond</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166"><Highlight kind="normal">                                         : <a href="#a69a7dfa5bfc081b957bae5cfe5d05d99">ForwardWeightUncond</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Backward</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t Dist = SrcAddr + SrcSize - DstAddr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#acc82cef9cbd4dab51921209f2a1ac14b">jumpExtTSPScore</a>(Dist, <a href="#a45811f65f5bf5edbaedfd1d7b630b97e">BackwardDistance</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"><Highlight kind="normal">                         IsConditional ? <a href="#a491b555b7858327d05029fe52447d992">BackwardWeightCond</a></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><Highlight kind="normal">                                       : <a href="#aea9eb0f6bac1ade99a6def26c68141c3">BackwardWeightUncond</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/chaint/#ad52b85a8e8d0ce2c03e179c58953f2ab"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/chaint/#ad52b85a8e8d0ce2c03e179c58953f2ab">Id</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Cached ext-tsp score for the chain.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/chaint/#af1b2e2cc9d9dd8b5a4c759fafd417b54"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/chaint/#af1b2e2cc9d9dd8b5a4c759fafd417b54">Score</a>&#123;0&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The total execution count of the chain. Since the execution count of</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// a basic block is uint64&#95;t, using doubles here to avoid overflow.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/chaint/#ab82df8348dc129dde89f41130e8f9f23"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/chaint/#ab82df8348dc129dde89f41130e8f9f23">ExecutionCount</a>&#123;0&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The total size of the chain.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/chaint/#a6ff270ac806363918a6618851705dad0"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/chaint/#a6ff270ac806363918a6618851705dad0">Size</a>&#123;0&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Adjacent chains and corresponding edges (lists of jumps).</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363" lineLink="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/chaint/#afa03a70cd891e1d9d7847fba325ef2c2"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;std::pair&lt;ChainT &#42;, ChainEdge &#42;&gt;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/chaint/#afa03a70cd891e1d9d7847fba325ef2c2">Edges</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"><Highlight kind="comment">/// An edge in the graph representing jumps between two chains.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><Highlight kind="comment">/// When nodes are merged into chains, the edges are combined too so that</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><Highlight kind="comment">/// there is always at most one edge between a pair of chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Merge two chains of nodes respecting a given &#39;type&#39; and &#39;offset&#39;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><Highlight kind="comment">///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><Highlight kind="comment">/// If MergeType == 0, then the result is a concatenation of two chains.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><Highlight kind="comment">/// Otherwise, the first chain is cut into two sub-chains at the offset,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><Highlight kind="comment">/// and merged using all possible ways of concatenating three chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a800ced24f890a965660badbbd70800d2"><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/structs/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/mergednodest">MergedNodesT</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a800ced24f890a965660badbbd70800d2">mergeNodes</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;NodeT &#42;&gt; &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><Highlight kind="normal">                        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;NodeT &#42;&gt; &amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergeOffset,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><Highlight kind="normal">                        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6">MergeTypeT</a> MergeType) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Split the first chain, X, into X1 and X2.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#ada0856182ddb592b34f37da3f4dc1eb5">NodeIter</a> BeginX1 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>.begin();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#ada0856182ddb592b34f37da3f4dc1eb5">NodeIter</a> EndX1 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>.begin() + MergeOffset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#ada0856182ddb592b34f37da3f4dc1eb5">NodeIter</a> BeginX2 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>.begin() + MergeOffset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#ada0856182ddb592b34f37da3f4dc1eb5">NodeIter</a> EndX2 = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#ab60f28d7a141ac46ccc200176a1bca8b">X</a>.end();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#ada0856182ddb592b34f37da3f4dc1eb5">NodeIter</a> BeginY = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>.begin();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#ada0856182ddb592b34f37da3f4dc1eb5">NodeIter</a> EndY = <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/tablegen/tablegenbackendskeleton-cpp/#a262774d3e5186511427e5b2414a85f7f">Y</a>.end();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Construct a new chain from the three existing ones.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">switch</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (MergeType) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The implementation of the ExtTSP algorithm.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/exttspimpl"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/exttspimpl/#a47333daefb26df0fb055e84fc9a77d9d">ExtTSPImpl</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/exttspimpl/#a47333daefb26df0fb055e84fc9a77d9d"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/exttspimpl/#a47333daefb26df0fb055e84fc9a77d9d">ExtTSPImpl</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> NodeSizes, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> NodeCounts,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><Highlight kind="normal">             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;EdgeCount&gt;</a> EdgeCounts)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593"><Highlight kind="normal">      : NumNodes(NodeSizes.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#a19d27915595e7f0a0ef271448bcdac6f">initialize</a>(NodeSizes, NodeCounts, EdgeCounts);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Run the algorithm and return an optimized ordering of nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00598" /><CodeLine lineNumber="598" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/exttspimpl/#a42779621a7ce56ea05e1319893cbc258"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/exttspimpl/#a42779621a7ce56ea05e1319893cbc258">run</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00599" /><CodeLine lineNumber="599"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Pass 1: Merge nodes with their mutually forced successors</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00600" /><CodeLine lineNumber="600"><Highlight kind="normal">    mergeForcedPairs();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Pass 2: Merge pairs of chains while improving the ExtTSP objective</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><Highlight kind="normal">    mergeChainPairs();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Pass 3: Merge cold nodes to reduce code size</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><Highlight kind="normal">    mergeColdChains();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Collect nodes from all chains</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> concatChains();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Initialize the algorithm&#39;s data structures.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#a19d27915595e7f0a0ef271448bcdac6f">initialize</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> &amp;NodeSizes,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> &amp;NodeCounts,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;EdgeCount&gt;</a> &amp;EdgeCounts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><Highlight kind="normal">    AllNodes.reserve(NumNodes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint64&#95;t Idx = 0; Idx &lt; NumNodes; Idx++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = std::max&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;(NodeSizes&#91;Idx&#93;, 1ULL);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t ExecutionCount = NodeCounts&#91;Idx&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The execution count of the entry node is set to at least one.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Idx == 0 &amp;&amp; ExecutionCount == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><Highlight kind="normal">        ExecutionCount = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><Highlight kind="normal">      AllNodes.emplace&#95;back(Idx, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, ExecutionCount);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize jumps between the nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><Highlight kind="normal">    SuccNodes.resize(NumNodes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><Highlight kind="normal">    PredNodes.resize(NumNodes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; OutDegree(NumNodes, 0);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><Highlight kind="normal">    AllJumps.reserve(EdgeCounts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Edge : EdgeCounts) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++OutDegree&#91;Edge.src&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore self-edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Edge.src == Edge.dst)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><Highlight kind="normal">      SuccNodes&#91;Edge.src&#93;.push&#95;back(Edge.dst);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><Highlight kind="normal">      PredNodes&#91;Edge.dst&#93;.push&#95;back(Edge.src);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Edge.count &gt; 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><Highlight kind="normal">        NodeT &amp;PredNode = AllNodes&#91;Edge.src&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><Highlight kind="normal">        NodeT &amp;SuccNode = AllNodes&#91;Edge.dst&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><Highlight kind="normal">        AllJumps.emplace&#95;back(&amp;PredNode, &amp;SuccNode, Edge.count);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><Highlight kind="normal">        SuccNode.InJumps.push&#95;back(&amp;AllJumps.back());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><Highlight kind="normal">        PredNode.OutJumps.push&#95;back(&amp;AllJumps.back());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Adjust execution counts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><Highlight kind="normal">        PredNode.ExecutionCount = std::max(PredNode.ExecutionCount, Edge.count);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><Highlight kind="normal">        SuccNode.ExecutionCount = std::max(SuccNode.ExecutionCount, Edge.count);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (JumpT &amp;Jump : AllJumps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(OutDegree&#91;Jump.Source-&gt;Index&#93; &gt; 0 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654"><Highlight kind="normal">             </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;incorrectly computed out-degree of the block&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><Highlight kind="normal">      Jump.IsConditional = OutDegree&#91;Jump.Source-&gt;Index&#93; &gt; 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><Highlight kind="normal">    AllChains.reserve(NumNodes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><Highlight kind="normal">    HotChains.reserve(NumNodes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NodeT &amp;Node : AllNodes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create a chain.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><Highlight kind="normal">      AllChains.emplace&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.Index, &amp;Node);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.CurChain = &amp;AllChains.back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.ExecutionCount &gt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><Highlight kind="normal">        HotChains.push&#95;back(&amp;AllChains.back());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize chain edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><Highlight kind="normal">    AllEdges.reserve(AllJumps.size());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NodeT &amp;PredNode : AllNodes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (JumpT &#42;Jump : PredNode.OutJumps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Jump-&gt;ExecutionCount &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;incorrectly initialized jump&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><Highlight kind="normal">        NodeT &#42;SuccNode = Jump-&gt;Target;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><Highlight kind="normal">        ChainEdge &#42;CurEdge = PredNode.CurChain-&gt;getEdge(SuccNode-&gt;CurChain);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This edge is already present in the graph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurEdge != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SuccNode-&gt;CurChain-&gt;getEdge(PredNode.CurChain) != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679"><Highlight kind="normal">          CurEdge-&gt;appendJump(Jump);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is a new edge.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><Highlight kind="normal">        AllEdges.emplace&#95;back(Jump);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"><Highlight kind="normal">        PredNode.CurChain-&gt;addEdge(SuccNode-&gt;CurChain, &amp;AllEdges.back());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685"><Highlight kind="normal">        SuccNode-&gt;CurChain-&gt;addEdge(PredNode.CurChain, &amp;AllEdges.back());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// For a pair of nodes, A and B, node B is the forced successor of A,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// if (i) all jumps (based on profile) from A goes to B and (ii) all jumps</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// to B are from A. Such nodes should be adjacent in the optimal ordering;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// the method finds and merges such pairs of nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> mergeForcedPairs() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Find forced pairs of blocks.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NodeT &amp;Node : AllNodes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SuccNodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.Index&#93;.size() == 1 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><Highlight kind="normal">          PredNodes&#91;SuccNodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.Index&#93;&#91;0&#93;&#93;.size() == 1 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><Highlight kind="normal">          SuccNodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.Index&#93;&#91;0&#93; != 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SuccIndex = SuccNodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.Index&#93;&#91;0&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.ForcedSucc = &amp;AllNodes&#91;SuccIndex&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><Highlight kind="normal">        AllNodes&#91;SuccIndex&#93;.ForcedPred = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// There might be &#39;cycles&#39; in the forced dependencies, since profile</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// data isn&#39;t 100% accurate. Typically this is observed in loops, when the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loop edges are the hottest successors for the basic blocks of the loop.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Break the cycles by choosing the node with the smallest index as the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// head. This helps to keep the original order of the loops, which likely</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// have already been rotated in the optimized manner.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NodeT &amp;Node : AllNodes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.ForcedSucc == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.ForcedPred == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"><Highlight kind="normal">      NodeT &#42;SuccNode = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.ForcedSucc;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SuccNode != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&amp; SuccNode != &amp;Node) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><Highlight kind="normal">        SuccNode = SuccNode-&gt;ForcedSucc;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SuccNode == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Break the cycle.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><Highlight kind="normal">      AllNodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.ForcedPred-&gt;Index&#93;.ForcedSucc = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.ForcedPred = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Merge nodes with their fallthrough successors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NodeT &amp;Node : AllNodes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.ForcedPred == </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.ForcedSucc != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeT &#42;CurBlock = &amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurBlock-&gt;ForcedSucc != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeT &#42;NextBlock = CurBlock-&gt;ForcedSucc;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><Highlight kind="normal">          mergeChains(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.CurChain, NextBlock-&gt;CurChain, 0, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6a72fa45c61dc40121aa4b4dcc30e90820">MergeTypeT::X&#95;Y</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><Highlight kind="normal">          CurBlock = NextBlock;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00739" /><CodeLine lineNumber="739"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00740" /><CodeLine lineNumber="740"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Merge pairs of chains while improving the ExtTSP objective.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00741" /><CodeLine lineNumber="741"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> mergeChainPairs() &#123;</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00742" /><CodeLine lineNumber="742"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Deterministically compare pairs of chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00743" /><CodeLine lineNumber="743"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> compareChainPairs = &#91;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChainT &#42;A1, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChainT &#42;B1,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00744" /><CodeLine lineNumber="744"><Highlight kind="normal">                                </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChainT &#42;A2, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChainT &#42;B2) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00745" /><CodeLine lineNumber="745"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;tuple(A1-&gt;Id, B1-&gt;Id) &lt; std::make&#95;tuple(A2-&gt;Id, B2-&gt;Id);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00746" /><CodeLine lineNumber="746"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00747" /><CodeLine lineNumber="747"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00748" /><CodeLine lineNumber="748"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (HotChains.size() &gt; 1) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00749" /><CodeLine lineNumber="749"><Highlight kind="normal">      ChainT &#42;BestChainPred = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00750" /><CodeLine lineNumber="750"><Highlight kind="normal">      ChainT &#42;BestChainSucc = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00751" /><CodeLine lineNumber="751"><Highlight kind="normal">      MergeGainT BestGain;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00752" /><CodeLine lineNumber="752"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Iterate over all pairs of chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00753" /><CodeLine lineNumber="753"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ChainT &#42;ChainPred : HotChains) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00754" /><CodeLine lineNumber="754"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Get candidates for merging with the current chain.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00755" /><CodeLine lineNumber="755"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;ChainSucc, Edge&#93; : ChainPred-&gt;Edges) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00756" /><CodeLine lineNumber="756"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore loop edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00757" /><CodeLine lineNumber="757"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;isSelfEdge())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00758" /><CodeLine lineNumber="758"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00759" /><CodeLine lineNumber="759"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip the merge if the combined chain violates the maximum specified</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00760" /><CodeLine lineNumber="760"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00761" /><CodeLine lineNumber="761"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ChainPred-&gt;numBlocks() + ChainSucc-&gt;numBlocks() &gt;= <a href="#ab536d90179318d2459d2f863e6bb4395">MaxChainSize</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00762" /><CodeLine lineNumber="762"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00763" /><CodeLine lineNumber="763"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Don&#39;t merge the chains if they have vastly different densities.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00764" /><CodeLine lineNumber="764"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip the merge if the ratio between the densities exceeds</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00765" /><CodeLine lineNumber="765"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// MaxMergeDensityRatio. Smaller values of the option result in fewer</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00766" /><CodeLine lineNumber="766"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// merges, and hence, more chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00767" /><CodeLine lineNumber="767"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChainPredDensity = ChainPred-&gt;density();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00768" /><CodeLine lineNumber="768"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChainSuccDensity = ChainSucc-&gt;density();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00769" /><CodeLine lineNumber="769"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(ChainPredDensity &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; ChainSuccDensity &gt; 0 &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00770" /><CodeLine lineNumber="770"><Highlight kind="normal">                 </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;incorrectly computed chain densities&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00771" /><CodeLine lineNumber="771"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;MinDensity, MaxDensity&#93; =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00772" /><CodeLine lineNumber="772"><Highlight kind="normal">              std::minmax(ChainPredDensity, ChainSuccDensity);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00773" /><CodeLine lineNumber="773"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Ratio = MaxDensity / MinDensity;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00774" /><CodeLine lineNumber="774"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Ratio &gt; <a href="#af746be62855831f5d39007097edcf4c7">MaxMergeDensityRatio</a>)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00775" /><CodeLine lineNumber="775"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00776" /><CodeLine lineNumber="776"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00777" /><CodeLine lineNumber="777"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the gain of merging the two chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00778" /><CodeLine lineNumber="778"><Highlight kind="normal">          MergeGainT CurGain = getBestMergeGain(ChainPred, ChainSucc, Edge);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00779" /><CodeLine lineNumber="779"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurGain.score() &lt;= EPS)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00780" /><CodeLine lineNumber="780"><Highlight kind="normal">            </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00781" /><CodeLine lineNumber="781"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00782" /><CodeLine lineNumber="782"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BestGain &lt; CurGain ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00783" /><CodeLine lineNumber="783"><Highlight kind="normal">              (std::abs(CurGain.score() - BestGain.score()) &lt; EPS &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00784" /><CodeLine lineNumber="784"><Highlight kind="normal">               compareChainPairs(ChainPred, ChainSucc, BestChainPred,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00785" /><CodeLine lineNumber="785"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 BestChainSucc))) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00786" /><CodeLine lineNumber="786"><Highlight kind="normal">            BestGain = CurGain;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00787" /><CodeLine lineNumber="787"><Highlight kind="normal">            BestChainPred = ChainPred;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00788" /><CodeLine lineNumber="788"><Highlight kind="normal">            BestChainSucc = ChainSucc;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00789" /><CodeLine lineNumber="789"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00790" /><CodeLine lineNumber="790"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00791" /><CodeLine lineNumber="791"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00792" /><CodeLine lineNumber="792"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00793" /><CodeLine lineNumber="793"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Stop merging when there is no improvement.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00794" /><CodeLine lineNumber="794"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BestGain.score() &lt;= EPS)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00795" /><CodeLine lineNumber="795"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">break</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00796" /><CodeLine lineNumber="796"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00797" /><CodeLine lineNumber="797"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Merge the best pair of chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00798" /><CodeLine lineNumber="798"><Highlight kind="normal">      mergeChains(BestChainPred, BestChainSucc, BestGain.mergeOffset(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00799" /><CodeLine lineNumber="799"><Highlight kind="normal">                  BestGain.mergeType());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00800" /><CodeLine lineNumber="800"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00801" /><CodeLine lineNumber="801"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00802" /><CodeLine lineNumber="802"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00803" /><CodeLine lineNumber="803"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Merge remaining nodes into chains w/o taking jump counts into</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00804" /><CodeLine lineNumber="804"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// consideration. This allows to maintain the original node order in the</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00805" /><CodeLine lineNumber="805"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// absence of profile data.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00806" /><CodeLine lineNumber="806"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> mergeColdChains() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00807" /><CodeLine lineNumber="807"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> SrcBB = 0; SrcBB &lt; NumNodes; SrcBB++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00808" /><CodeLine lineNumber="808"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Iterating in reverse order to make sure original fallthrough jumps are</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00809" /><CodeLine lineNumber="809"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// merged first; this might be beneficial for code size.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00810" /><CodeLine lineNumber="810"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumSuccs = SuccNodes&#91;SrcBB&#93;.size();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00811" /><CodeLine lineNumber="811"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Idx = 0; Idx &lt; NumSuccs; Idx++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00812" /><CodeLine lineNumber="812"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DstBB = SuccNodes&#91;SrcBB&#93;&#91;NumSuccs - Idx - 1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00813" /><CodeLine lineNumber="813"><Highlight kind="normal">        ChainT &#42;SrcChain = AllNodes&#91;SrcBB&#93;.CurChain;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00814" /><CodeLine lineNumber="814"><Highlight kind="normal">        ChainT &#42;DstChain = AllNodes&#91;DstBB&#93;.CurChain;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00815" /><CodeLine lineNumber="815"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcChain != DstChain &amp;&amp; !DstChain-&gt;isEntry() &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00816" /><CodeLine lineNumber="816"><Highlight kind="normal">            SrcChain-&gt;Nodes.back()-&gt;Index == SrcBB &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00817" /><CodeLine lineNumber="817"><Highlight kind="normal">            DstChain-&gt;Nodes.front()-&gt;Index == DstBB &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00818" /><CodeLine lineNumber="818"><Highlight kind="normal">            SrcChain-&gt;isCold() == DstChain-&gt;isCold()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00819" /><CodeLine lineNumber="819"><Highlight kind="normal">          mergeChains(SrcChain, DstChain, 0, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6a72fa45c61dc40121aa4b4dcc30e90820">MergeTypeT::X&#95;Y</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00820" /><CodeLine lineNumber="820"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00821" /><CodeLine lineNumber="821"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00822" /><CodeLine lineNumber="822"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00823" /><CodeLine lineNumber="823"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00824" /><CodeLine lineNumber="824"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00825" /><CodeLine lineNumber="825"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the Ext-TSP score for a given node order and a list of jumps.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00826" /><CodeLine lineNumber="826"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> extTSPScore(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergedNodesT &amp;Nodes,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00827" /><CodeLine lineNumber="827"><Highlight kind="normal">                     </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergedJumpsT &amp;Jumps)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00828" /><CodeLine lineNumber="828"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t CurAddr = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00829" /><CodeLine lineNumber="829"><Highlight kind="normal">    Nodes.forEach(&#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeT &#42;Node) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00830" /><CodeLine lineNumber="830"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;EstimatedAddr = CurAddr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00831" /><CodeLine lineNumber="831"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurAddr += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;Size;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00832" /><CodeLine lineNumber="832"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00833" /><CodeLine lineNumber="833"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00834" /><CodeLine lineNumber="834"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Score = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00835" /><CodeLine lineNumber="835"><Highlight kind="normal">    Jumps.forEach(&#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> JumpT &#42;Jump) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00836" /><CodeLine lineNumber="836"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeT &#42;SrcBlock = Jump-&gt;Source;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00837" /><CodeLine lineNumber="837"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeT &#42;DstBlock = Jump-&gt;Target;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00838" /><CodeLine lineNumber="838"><Highlight kind="normal">      Score += ::extTSPScore(SrcBlock-&gt;EstimatedAddr, SrcBlock-&gt;Size,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00839" /><CodeLine lineNumber="839"><Highlight kind="normal">                             DstBlock-&gt;EstimatedAddr, Jump-&gt;ExecutionCount,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00840" /><CodeLine lineNumber="840"><Highlight kind="normal">                             Jump-&gt;IsConditional);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00841" /><CodeLine lineNumber="841"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00842" /><CodeLine lineNumber="842"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Score;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00843" /><CodeLine lineNumber="843"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00844" /><CodeLine lineNumber="844"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00845" /><CodeLine lineNumber="845"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the gain of merging two chains.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00846" /><CodeLine lineNumber="846"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00847" /><CodeLine lineNumber="847"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The function considers all possible ways of merging two chains and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00848" /><CodeLine lineNumber="848"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// computes the one having the largest increase in ExtTSP objective. The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00849" /><CodeLine lineNumber="849"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// result is a pair with the first element being the gain and the second</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00850" /><CodeLine lineNumber="850"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// element being the corresponding merging type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00851" /><CodeLine lineNumber="851"><Highlight kind="normal">  MergeGainT getBestMergeGain(ChainT &#42;ChainPred, ChainT &#42;ChainSucc,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00852" /><CodeLine lineNumber="852"><Highlight kind="normal">                              ChainEdge &#42;Edge)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00853" /><CodeLine lineNumber="853"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;hasCachedMergeGain(ChainPred, ChainSucc))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00854" /><CodeLine lineNumber="854"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;getCachedMergeGain(ChainPred, ChainSucc);</Highlight></CodeLine>
