<Link id="l00855" /><CodeLine lineNumber="855"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00856" /><CodeLine lineNumber="856"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;jumps().empty() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;trying to merge chains w/o jumps&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00857" /><CodeLine lineNumber="857"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Precompute jumps between ChainPred and ChainSucc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00858" /><CodeLine lineNumber="858"><Highlight kind="normal">    ChainEdge &#42;EdgePP = ChainPred-&gt;getEdge(ChainPred);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00859" /><CodeLine lineNumber="859"><Highlight kind="normal">    MergedJumpsT Jumps(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;jumps(), EdgePP ? &amp;EdgePP-&gt;jumps() : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00860" /><CodeLine lineNumber="860"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00861" /><CodeLine lineNumber="861"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This object holds the best chosen gain of merging two chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00862" /><CodeLine lineNumber="862"><Highlight kind="normal">    MergeGainT Gain = MergeGainT();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00863" /><CodeLine lineNumber="863"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00864" /><CodeLine lineNumber="864"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Given a merge offset and a list of merge types, try to merge two chains</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00865" /><CodeLine lineNumber="865"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// and update Gain with a better alternative.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00866" /><CodeLine lineNumber="866"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> tryChainMerging = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00867" /><CodeLine lineNumber="867"><Highlight kind="normal">                               </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;MergeTypeT&gt; &amp;MergeTypes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00868" /><CodeLine lineNumber="868"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip merging corresponding to concatenation w/o splitting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00869" /><CodeLine lineNumber="869"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> == 0 || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> == ChainPred-&gt;Nodes.size())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00870" /><CodeLine lineNumber="870"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00871" /><CodeLine lineNumber="871"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Skip merging if it breaks Forced successors.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00872" /><CodeLine lineNumber="872"><Highlight kind="normal">      NodeT &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a> = ChainPred-&gt;Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> - 1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00873" /><CodeLine lineNumber="873"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;ForcedSucc != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00874" /><CodeLine lineNumber="874"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00875" /><CodeLine lineNumber="875"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Apply the merge, compute the corresponding gain, and update the best</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00876" /><CodeLine lineNumber="876"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value, if the merge is beneficial.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00877" /><CodeLine lineNumber="877"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergeTypeT &amp;MergeType : MergeTypes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00878" /><CodeLine lineNumber="878"><Highlight kind="normal">        Gain.updateIfLessThan(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00879" /><CodeLine lineNumber="879"><Highlight kind="normal">            computeMergeGain(ChainPred, ChainSucc, Jumps, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, MergeType));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00880" /><CodeLine lineNumber="880"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00881" /><CodeLine lineNumber="881"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00882" /><CodeLine lineNumber="882"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00883" /><CodeLine lineNumber="883"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to concatenate two chains w/o splitting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00884" /><CodeLine lineNumber="884"><Highlight kind="normal">    Gain.updateIfLessThan(</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00885" /><CodeLine lineNumber="885"><Highlight kind="normal">        computeMergeGain(ChainPred, ChainSucc, Jumps, 0, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6a72fa45c61dc40121aa4b4dcc30e90820">MergeTypeT::X&#95;Y</a>));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00886" /><CodeLine lineNumber="886"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00887" /><CodeLine lineNumber="887"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Attach (a part of) ChainPred before the first node of ChainSucc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00888" /><CodeLine lineNumber="888"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (JumpT &#42;Jump : ChainSucc-&gt;Nodes.front()-&gt;InJumps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00889" /><CodeLine lineNumber="889"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeT &#42;SrcBlock = Jump-&gt;Source;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00890" /><CodeLine lineNumber="890"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SrcBlock-&gt;CurChain != ChainPred)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00891" /><CodeLine lineNumber="891"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00892" /><CodeLine lineNumber="892"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = SrcBlock-&gt;CurIndex + 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00893" /><CodeLine lineNumber="893"><Highlight kind="normal">      tryChainMerging(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, &#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6ae2695a1ee61f06b989afe801282dd43d">MergeTypeT::X1&#95;Y&#95;X2</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6a9d20ddbb9d2f9e8166a4269812114e0d">MergeTypeT::X2&#95;X1&#95;Y</a>&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00894" /><CodeLine lineNumber="894"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00895" /><CodeLine lineNumber="895"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00896" /><CodeLine lineNumber="896"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Attach (a part of) ChainPred after the last node of ChainSucc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00897" /><CodeLine lineNumber="897"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (JumpT &#42;Jump : ChainSucc-&gt;Nodes.back()-&gt;OutJumps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00898" /><CodeLine lineNumber="898"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeT &#42;DstBlock = Jump-&gt;Target;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00899" /><CodeLine lineNumber="899"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (DstBlock-&gt;CurChain != ChainPred)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00900" /><CodeLine lineNumber="900"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00901" /><CodeLine lineNumber="901"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = DstBlock-&gt;CurIndex;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00902" /><CodeLine lineNumber="902"><Highlight kind="normal">      tryChainMerging(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, &#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6ae2695a1ee61f06b989afe801282dd43d">MergeTypeT::X1&#95;Y&#95;X2</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6a72f1dd34dd1257167754a0d65ae72a49">MergeTypeT::Y&#95;X2&#95;X1</a>&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00903" /><CodeLine lineNumber="903"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00904" /><CodeLine lineNumber="904"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00905" /><CodeLine lineNumber="905"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to break ChainPred in various ways and concatenate with ChainSucc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00906" /><CodeLine lineNumber="906"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ChainPred-&gt;Nodes.size() &lt;= <a href="#ac338de4165af2f0c5d7670f38e8ea1b9">ChainSplitThreshold</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00907" /><CodeLine lineNumber="907"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> = 1; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> &lt; ChainPred-&gt;Nodes.size(); <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00908" /><CodeLine lineNumber="908"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do not split the chain along a fall-through jump. One of the two</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00909" /><CodeLine lineNumber="909"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// loops above may still &quot;break&quot; such a jump whenever it results in a</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00910" /><CodeLine lineNumber="910"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// new fall-through.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00911" /><CodeLine lineNumber="911"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeT &#42;BB = ChainPred-&gt;Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a> - 1&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00912" /><CodeLine lineNumber="912"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeT &#42;BB2 = ChainPred-&gt;Nodes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00913" /><CodeLine lineNumber="913"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BB-&gt;isSuccessor(BB2))</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00914" /><CodeLine lineNumber="914"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00915" /><CodeLine lineNumber="915"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00916" /><CodeLine lineNumber="916"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// In practice, applying X2&#95;Y&#95;X1 merging almost never provides benefits;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00917" /><CodeLine lineNumber="917"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// thus, we exclude it from consideration to reduce the search space.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00918" /><CodeLine lineNumber="918"><Highlight kind="normal">        tryChainMerging(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a05f5b9a11bdcc5feba62899f95dcf878a3134224cba2545bc57954d3b072aebb4">Offset</a>, &#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6ae2695a1ee61f06b989afe801282dd43d">MergeTypeT::X1&#95;Y&#95;X2</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6a72f1dd34dd1257167754a0d65ae72a49">MergeTypeT::Y&#95;X2&#95;X1</a>,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00919" /><CodeLine lineNumber="919"><Highlight kind="normal">                                 <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6a9d20ddbb9d2f9e8166a4269812114e0d">MergeTypeT::X2&#95;X1&#95;Y</a>&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00920" /><CodeLine lineNumber="920"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00921" /><CodeLine lineNumber="921"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00922" /><CodeLine lineNumber="922"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00923" /><CodeLine lineNumber="923"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;setCachedMergeGain(ChainPred, ChainSucc, Gain);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00924" /><CodeLine lineNumber="924"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Gain;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00925" /><CodeLine lineNumber="925"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00926" /><CodeLine lineNumber="926"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00927" /><CodeLine lineNumber="927"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the score gain of merging two chains, respecting a given</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00928" /><CodeLine lineNumber="928"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// merge &#39;type&#39; and &#39;offset&#39;.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00929" /><CodeLine lineNumber="929"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00930" /><CodeLine lineNumber="930"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The two chains are not modified in the method.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00931" /><CodeLine lineNumber="931"><Highlight kind="normal">  MergeGainT computeMergeGain(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChainT &#42;ChainPred, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChainT &#42;ChainSucc,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00932" /><CodeLine lineNumber="932"><Highlight kind="normal">                              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergedJumpsT &amp;Jumps, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergeOffset,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00933" /><CodeLine lineNumber="933"><Highlight kind="normal">                              MergeTypeT MergeType)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00934" /><CodeLine lineNumber="934"><Highlight kind="normal">    MergedNodesT MergedNodes =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00935" /><CodeLine lineNumber="935"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a800ced24f890a965660badbbd70800d2">mergeNodes</a>(ChainPred-&gt;Nodes, ChainSucc-&gt;Nodes, MergeOffset, MergeType);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00936" /><CodeLine lineNumber="936"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00937" /><CodeLine lineNumber="937"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Do not allow a merge that does not preserve the original entry point.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00938" /><CodeLine lineNumber="938"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((ChainPred-&gt;isEntry() || ChainSucc-&gt;isEntry()) &amp;&amp;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00939" /><CodeLine lineNumber="939"><Highlight kind="normal">        !MergedNodes.getFirstNode()-&gt;isEntry())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00940" /><CodeLine lineNumber="940"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergeGainT();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00941" /><CodeLine lineNumber="941"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00942" /><CodeLine lineNumber="942"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// The gain for the new chain.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00943" /><CodeLine lineNumber="943"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewScore = extTSPScore(MergedNodes, Jumps);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00944" /><CodeLine lineNumber="944"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurScore = ChainPred-&gt;Score;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00945" /><CodeLine lineNumber="945"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergeGainT(NewScore - CurScore, MergeOffset, MergeType);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00946" /><CodeLine lineNumber="946"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00947" /><CodeLine lineNumber="947"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00948" /><CodeLine lineNumber="948"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Merge chain From into chain Into, update the list of active chains,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00949" /><CodeLine lineNumber="949"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// adjacency information, and the corresponding cached values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00950" /><CodeLine lineNumber="950"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> mergeChains(ChainT &#42;Into, ChainT &#42;From, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergeOffset,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00951" /><CodeLine lineNumber="951"><Highlight kind="normal">                   MergeTypeT MergeType) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00952" /><CodeLine lineNumber="952"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Into != From &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;a chain cannot be merged with itself&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00953" /><CodeLine lineNumber="953"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00954" /><CodeLine lineNumber="954"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Merge the nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00955" /><CodeLine lineNumber="955"><Highlight kind="normal">    MergedNodesT MergedNodes =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00956" /><CodeLine lineNumber="956"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a800ced24f890a965660badbbd70800d2">mergeNodes</a>(Into-&gt;Nodes, From-&gt;Nodes, MergeOffset, MergeType);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00957" /><CodeLine lineNumber="957"><Highlight kind="normal">    Into-&gt;merge(From, MergedNodes.getNodes());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00958" /><CodeLine lineNumber="958"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00959" /><CodeLine lineNumber="959"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Merge the edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00960" /><CodeLine lineNumber="960"><Highlight kind="normal">    Into-&gt;mergeEdges(From);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00961" /><CodeLine lineNumber="961"><Highlight kind="normal">    From-&gt;clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00962" /><CodeLine lineNumber="962"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00963" /><CodeLine lineNumber="963"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Update cached ext-tsp score for the new chain.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00964" /><CodeLine lineNumber="964"><Highlight kind="normal">    ChainEdge &#42;SelfEdge = Into-&gt;getEdge(Into);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00965" /><CodeLine lineNumber="965"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (SelfEdge != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00966" /><CodeLine lineNumber="966"><Highlight kind="normal">      MergedNodes = MergedNodesT(Into-&gt;Nodes.begin(), Into-&gt;Nodes.end());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00967" /><CodeLine lineNumber="967"><Highlight kind="normal">      MergedJumpsT MergedJumps(&amp;SelfEdge-&gt;jumps());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00968" /><CodeLine lineNumber="968"><Highlight kind="normal">      Into-&gt;Score = extTSPScore(MergedNodes, MergedJumps);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00969" /><CodeLine lineNumber="969"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00970" /><CodeLine lineNumber="970"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00971" /><CodeLine lineNumber="971"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Remove the chain from the list of active chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00972" /><CodeLine lineNumber="972"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a60a348350395aef11d68f58111bcf499">llvm::erase</a>(HotChains, From);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00973" /><CodeLine lineNumber="973"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00974" /><CodeLine lineNumber="974"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Invalidate caches.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00975" /><CodeLine lineNumber="975"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> EdgeIt : Into-&gt;Edges)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00976" /><CodeLine lineNumber="976"><Highlight kind="normal">      EdgeIt.second-&gt;invalidateCache();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00977" /><CodeLine lineNumber="977"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00978" /><CodeLine lineNumber="978"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00979" /><CodeLine lineNumber="979"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Concatenate all chains into the final order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00980" /><CodeLine lineNumber="980"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; concatChains() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00981" /><CodeLine lineNumber="981"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Collect non-empty chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00982" /><CodeLine lineNumber="982"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;const ChainT &#42;&gt; SortedChains;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00983" /><CodeLine lineNumber="983"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ChainT &amp;Chain : AllChains) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00984" /><CodeLine lineNumber="984"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-loadstorevectorizer-cpp-/#afd1adfcbfce320e6265935ce4d6299a3">Chain</a>.Nodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00985" /><CodeLine lineNumber="985"><Highlight kind="normal">        SortedChains.push&#95;back(&amp;Chain);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00986" /><CodeLine lineNumber="986"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00987" /><CodeLine lineNumber="987"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00988" /><CodeLine lineNumber="988"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Sorting chains by density in the decreasing order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00989" /><CodeLine lineNumber="989"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::sort(SortedChains.begin(), SortedChains.end(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00990" /><CodeLine lineNumber="990"><Highlight kind="normal">              &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChainT &#42;L, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChainT &#42;R) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00991" /><CodeLine lineNumber="991"><Highlight kind="normal">                </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Place the entry point at the beginning of the order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00992" /><CodeLine lineNumber="992"><Highlight kind="normal">                if (L-&gt;isEntry() != R-&gt;isEntry())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00993" /><CodeLine lineNumber="993"><Highlight kind="normal">                  return L-&gt;isEntry();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00994" /><CodeLine lineNumber="994"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00995" /><CodeLine lineNumber="995"><Highlight kind="normal">                </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compare by density and break ties by chain identifiers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00996" /><CodeLine lineNumber="996"><Highlight kind="normal">                return std::make&#95;tuple(-L-&gt;density(), L-&gt;Id) &lt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00997" /><CodeLine lineNumber="997"><Highlight kind="normal">                       std::make&#95;tuple(-R-&gt;density(), R-&gt;Id);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00998" /><CodeLine lineNumber="998"><Highlight kind="normal">              &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00999" /><CodeLine lineNumber="999"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01000" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1000"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Collect the nodes in the order specified by their chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01001" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1001"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; Order;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01002" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1002"><Highlight kind="normal">    Order.reserve(NumNodes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01003" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1003"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChainT &#42;Chain : SortedChains)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01004" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1004"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NodeT &#42;Node : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-loadstorevectorizer-cpp-/#afd1adfcbfce320e6265935ce4d6299a3">Chain</a>-&gt;Nodes)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01005" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1005"><Highlight kind="normal">        Order.push&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;Index);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01006" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1006"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Order;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01007" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1007"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01008" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1008"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01009" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1009"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">private</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01010" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1010"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The number of nodes in the graph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01011" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1011"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumNodes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01012" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1012"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01013" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1013"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Successors of each node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01014" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1014"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;&gt; SuccNodes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01015" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1015"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01016" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1016"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Predecessors of each node.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01017" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1017"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;&gt; PredNodes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01018" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1018"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01019" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1019"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// All nodes (basic blocks) in the graph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01020" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1020"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;NodeT&gt; AllNodes;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01021" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1021"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01023" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1023"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;JumpT&gt; AllJumps;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01032" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1032"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;ChainT &#42;&gt; HotChains;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01033" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1033"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01034" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1034"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01035" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1035"><Highlight kind="comment">/// The implementation of the Cache-Directed Sort (CDSort) algorithm for</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01036" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1036"><Highlight kind="comment">/// ordering functions represented by a call graph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01037" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1037" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/cdsortimpl"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">class </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"><a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/cdsortimpl/#a68a9823d565755fe71d5a54fb0262947">CDSortImpl</a> &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01038" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1038"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01039" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1039" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/cdsortimpl/#a68a9823d565755fe71d5a54fb0262947"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/cdsortimpl/#a68a9823d565755fe71d5a54fb0262947">CDSortImpl</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/codelayout/cdsortconfig">CDSortConfig</a> &amp;Config, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> NodeSizes,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01040" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1040"><Highlight kind="normal">             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> NodeCounts, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;EdgeCount&gt;</a> EdgeCounts,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01041" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1041"><Highlight kind="normal">             <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> EdgeOffsets)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01042" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1042"><Highlight kind="normal">      : Config(Config), NumNodes(NodeSizes.<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a10f3d955592ae2bc745f57e5b48ae115">size</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01043" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1043"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#a19d27915595e7f0a0ef271448bcdac6f">initialize</a>(NodeSizes, NodeCounts, EdgeCounts, EdgeOffsets);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01044" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1044"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01046" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1046"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Run the algorithm and return an ordered set of function clusters.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01047" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1047" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/cdsortimpl/#a562000bf2e945e451f810aac853454ca"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-codelayout-cpp-/cdsortimpl/#a562000bf2e945e451f810aac853454ca">run</a>() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01048" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1048"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Merge pairs of chains while improving the objective.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01049" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1049"><Highlight kind="normal">    mergeChainPairs();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01050" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1050"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01051" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1051"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Collect nodes from all the chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01052" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1052"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> concatChains();</Highlight></CodeLine>
