<Link id="l01056" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1056"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Initialize the algorithm&#39;s data structures.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01057" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1057"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/targetlibraryinfo-cpp/#a19d27915595e7f0a0ef271448bcdac6f">initialize</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> &amp;NodeSizes,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01058" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1058"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> &amp;NodeCounts,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01059" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1059"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;EdgeCount&gt;</a> &amp;EdgeCounts,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01060" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1060"><Highlight kind="normal">                  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;</a> &amp;EdgeOffsets) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01061" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1061"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01062" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1062"><Highlight kind="normal">    AllNodes.reserve(NumNodes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01063" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1063"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a> &lt; NumNodes; <a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01064" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1064"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = std::max&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt;(NodeSizes&#91;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>&#93;, 1ULL);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01065" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1065"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t ExecutionCount = NodeCounts&#91;<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01066" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1066"><Highlight kind="normal">      AllNodes.emplace&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/classes/node">Node</a>, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>, ExecutionCount);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1067"><Highlight kind="normal">      TotalSamples += ExecutionCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1068"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ExecutionCount &gt; 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1069"><Highlight kind="normal">        TotalSize += <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1070"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1071"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1072"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize jumps between the nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1073"><Highlight kind="normal">    SuccNodes.resize(NumNodes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1074"><Highlight kind="normal">    PredNodes.resize(NumNodes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1075"><Highlight kind="normal">    AllJumps.reserve(EdgeCounts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1076"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> &lt; EdgeCounts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>(); <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>++) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1077"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#91;Pred, Succ, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>&#93; = EdgeCounts&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01078" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1078"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore recursive calls.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1079"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Pred == Succ)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1080"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1081"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1082"><Highlight kind="normal">      SuccNodes&#91;Pred&#93;.push&#95;back(Succ);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1083"><Highlight kind="normal">      PredNodes&#91;Succ&#93;.push&#95;back(Pred);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1084"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a> &gt; 0) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1085"><Highlight kind="normal">        NodeT &amp;PredNode = AllNodes&#91;Pred&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1086"><Highlight kind="normal">        NodeT &amp;SuccNode = AllNodes&#91;Succ&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1087"><Highlight kind="normal">        AllJumps.emplace&#95;back(&amp;PredNode, &amp;SuccNode, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1088"><Highlight kind="normal">        AllJumps.back().Offset = EdgeOffsets&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1089"><Highlight kind="normal">        SuccNode.InJumps.push&#95;back(&amp;AllJumps.back());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1090"><Highlight kind="normal">        PredNode.OutJumps.push&#95;back(&amp;AllJumps.back());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1091"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Adjust execution counts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1092"><Highlight kind="normal">        PredNode.ExecutionCount = std::max(PredNode.ExecutionCount, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1093"><Highlight kind="normal">        SuccNode.ExecutionCount = std::max(SuccNode.ExecutionCount, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1094"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1095"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1096"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1097"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1098"><Highlight kind="normal">    AllChains.reserve(NumNodes);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1099"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NodeT &amp;Node : AllNodes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1100"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Adjust execution counts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1101"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.ExecutionCount = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.ExecutionCount, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.inCount());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1102"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.ExecutionCount = std::max(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.ExecutionCount, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.outCount());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1103"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create chain.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1104"><Highlight kind="normal">      AllChains.emplace&#95;back(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.Index, &amp;Node);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1105"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.CurChain = &amp;AllChains.back();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1106"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1107"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1108"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Initialize chain edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1109"><Highlight kind="normal">    AllEdges.reserve(AllJumps.size());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1110"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NodeT &amp;PredNode : AllNodes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1111"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (JumpT &#42;Jump : PredNode.OutJumps) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1112"><Highlight kind="normal">        NodeT &#42;SuccNode = Jump-&gt;Target;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1113"><Highlight kind="normal">        ChainEdge &#42;CurEdge = PredNode.CurChain-&gt;getEdge(SuccNode-&gt;CurChain);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1114"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This edge is already present in the graph.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1115"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (CurEdge != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1116"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(SuccNode-&gt;CurChain-&gt;getEdge(PredNode.CurChain) != </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">nullptr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1117"><Highlight kind="normal">          CurEdge-&gt;appendJump(Jump);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1118"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1119"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1120"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This is a new edge.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1121"><Highlight kind="normal">        AllEdges.emplace&#95;back(Jump);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1122"><Highlight kind="normal">        PredNode.CurChain-&gt;addEdge(SuccNode-&gt;CurChain, &amp;AllEdges.back());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1123"><Highlight kind="normal">        SuccNode-&gt;CurChain-&gt;addEdge(PredNode.CurChain, &amp;AllEdges.back());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1124"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1125"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1126"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1127"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1128"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Merge pairs of chains while there is an improvement in the objective.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1129"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> mergeChainPairs() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1130"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Create a priority queue containing all edges ordered by the merge gain.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1131"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GainComparator = &#91;&#93;(ChainEdge &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>, ChainEdge &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1132"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::make&#95;tuple(-<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;gain(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;srcChain()-&gt;Id, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/m68k/#ab3a288f2953d8eca3e363959fc2cf38ead20caec3b48a1eef164cb4ca81ba2587">L</a>-&gt;dstChain()-&gt;Id) &lt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1133"><Highlight kind="normal">             std::make&#95;tuple(-<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>-&gt;gain(), <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>-&gt;srcChain()-&gt;Id, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/riscvfencefield/#a147be9e9780c1e33363ea572d4c7b25fa1835091d83e0e052cd1a32c99b2be731">R</a>-&gt;dstChain()-&gt;Id);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1134"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1135"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::set&lt;ChainEdge &#42;, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">decltype</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(GainComparator)&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>(GainComparator);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1136"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1137"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert the edges into the queue.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1138"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#91;&#91;maybe&#95;unused&#93;&#93; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NumActiveChains = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1139"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NodeT &amp;Node : AllNodes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1140"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.ExecutionCount == 0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1141"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1142"><Highlight kind="normal">      ++NumActiveChains;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1143"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/lib/target/hexagon/mctargetdesc/hexagonmccodeemitter-cpp/#ae4dfd7b0d66121016d6466d2ff10e8ba">&#95;</a>, Edge&#93; : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>.CurChain-&gt;Edges) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1144"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore self-edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1145"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;isSelfEdge())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1146"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1147"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore already processed edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1148"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;gain() != -1.0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1149"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1150"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1151"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the gain of merging the two chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1152"><Highlight kind="normal">        MergeGainT Gain = getBestMergeGain(Edge);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1153"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;setMergeGain(Gain);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1154"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1155"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;gain() &gt; EPS)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1156"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.insert(Edge);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1157"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1158"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1159"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1160"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Merge the chains while the gain of merging is positive.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1161"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">while</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.empty()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1162"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Extract the best (top) edge for merging.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1163"><Highlight kind="normal">      ChainEdge &#42;BestEdge = &#42;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.begin();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1164"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.erase(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.begin());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1165"><Highlight kind="normal">      ChainT &#42;BestSrcChain = BestEdge-&gt;srcChain();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1166"><Highlight kind="normal">      ChainT &#42;BestDstChain = BestEdge-&gt;dstChain();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1167"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1168"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Remove outdated edges from the queue.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1169"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/lib/target/hexagon/mctargetdesc/hexagonmccodeemitter-cpp/#ae4dfd7b0d66121016d6466d2ff10e8ba">&#95;</a>, ChainEdge&#93; : BestSrcChain-&gt;Edges)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1170"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.erase(ChainEdge);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1171"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/lib/target/hexagon/mctargetdesc/hexagonmccodeemitter-cpp/#ae4dfd7b0d66121016d6466d2ff10e8ba">&#95;</a>, ChainEdge&#93; : BestDstChain-&gt;Edges)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1172"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.erase(ChainEdge);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1173"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1174"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Merge the best pair of chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1175"><Highlight kind="normal">      MergeGainT BestGain = BestEdge-&gt;getMergeGain();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1176"><Highlight kind="normal">      mergeChains(BestSrcChain, BestDstChain, BestGain.mergeOffset(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1177"><Highlight kind="normal">                  BestGain.mergeType());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1178"><Highlight kind="normal">      --NumActiveChains;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1179"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1180"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Insert newly created edges into the queue.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1181"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &amp;&#91;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/hexagon/lib/target/hexagon/mctargetdesc/hexagonmccodeemitter-cpp/#ae4dfd7b0d66121016d6466d2ff10e8ba">&#95;</a>, Edge&#93; : BestSrcChain-&gt;Edges) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1182"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Ignore loop edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1183"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;isSelfEdge())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1184"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1185"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;srcChain()-&gt;numBlocks() + <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;dstChain()-&gt;numBlocks() &gt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1186"><Highlight kind="normal">            Config.MaxChainSize)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1187"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">continue</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1188"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1189"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compute the gain of merging the two chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1190"><Highlight kind="normal">        MergeGainT Gain = getBestMergeGain(Edge);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1191"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;setMergeGain(Gain);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1192"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1193"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;gain() &gt; EPS)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1194"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/amdgpu/hsamd/#a85803b71729d5d098ca2099f23cbf72ea722ad2d05ecf4868b00c5484b82fd808">Queue</a>.insert(Edge);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1195"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1196"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1197"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1198"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/debug-h/#a196897517069dda1bdb549e24468f7d7">LLVM&#95;DEBUG</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a7c46c742c31be54870e2038048e6b391">dbgs</a>() &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Cache-directed function sorting reduced the number&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1199"><Highlight kind="normal">                      &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; of chains from &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &lt;&lt; NumNodes &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot; to &quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1200"><Highlight kind="normal">                      &lt;&lt; NumActiveChains &lt;&lt; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;\\n&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1201"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1202"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1203"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the gain of merging two chains.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1204"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1205"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The function considers all possible ways of merging two chains and</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1206"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// computes the one having the largest increase in ExtTSP objective. The</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1207"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// result is a pair with the first element being the gain and the second</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1208"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// element being the corresponding merging type.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1209"><Highlight kind="normal">  MergeGainT getBestMergeGain(ChainEdge &#42;Edge)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1210"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;jumps().empty() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;trying to merge chains w/o jumps&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1211"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Precompute jumps between ChainPred and ChainSucc.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1212"><Highlight kind="normal">    MergedJumpsT Jumps(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;jumps());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1213"><Highlight kind="normal">    ChainT &#42;SrcChain = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;srcChain();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1214"><Highlight kind="normal">    ChainT &#42;DstChain = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/anonymous-spirvstructurizer-cpp-/#a8d66cf215f224ab9746eb012bfc6fbc4">Edge</a>-&gt;dstChain();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1215"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1216"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This object holds the best currently chosen gain of merging two chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1217"><Highlight kind="normal">    MergeGainT Gain = MergeGainT();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1218"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1219"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// Given a list of merge types, try to merge two chains and update Gain</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1220"><Highlight kind="comment">    /// with a better alternative.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1221"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> tryChainMerging = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> std::vector&lt;MergeTypeT&gt; &amp;MergeTypes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1222"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Apply the merge, compute the corresponding gain, and update the best</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1223"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// value, if the merge is beneficial.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1224"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergeTypeT &amp;MergeType : MergeTypes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1225"><Highlight kind="normal">        MergeGainT NewGain =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1226"><Highlight kind="normal">            computeMergeGain(SrcChain, DstChain, Jumps, MergeType);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1227"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1228"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// When forward and backward gains are the same, prioritize merging that</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1229"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// preserves the original order of the functions in the binary.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1230"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (std::abs(Gain.score() - NewGain.score()) &lt; EPS) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1231"><Highlight kind="normal">          </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ((MergeType == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6a72fa45c61dc40121aa4b4dcc30e90820">MergeTypeT::X&#95;Y</a> &amp;&amp; SrcChain-&gt;Id &lt; DstChain-&gt;Id) ||</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1232"><Highlight kind="normal">              (MergeType == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6afeb017af50619530f4425e4e3589daf4">MergeTypeT::Y&#95;X</a> &amp;&amp; SrcChain-&gt;Id &gt; DstChain-&gt;Id)) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1233"><Highlight kind="normal">            Gain = NewGain;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1234"><Highlight kind="normal">          &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1235"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125; </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">else</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NewGain.score() &gt; Gain.score() + EPS) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1236"><Highlight kind="normal">          Gain = NewGain;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1237"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1238"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1239"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1240"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1241"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Try to concatenate two chains w/o splitting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1242"><Highlight kind="normal">    tryChainMerging(&#123;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6a72fa45c61dc40121aa4b4dcc30e90820">MergeTypeT::X&#95;Y</a>, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a891fbaa9000c6c378ce647324830b0e6afeb017af50619530f4425e4e3589daf4">MergeTypeT::Y&#95;X</a>&#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1243"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1244"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> Gain;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1245"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1246"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1247"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the score gain of merging two chains, respecting a given type.</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1248"><Highlight kind="comment">  ///</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1249"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// The two chains are not modified in the method.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1250"><Highlight kind="normal">  MergeGainT computeMergeGain(ChainT &#42;ChainPred, ChainT &#42;ChainSucc,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1251"><Highlight kind="normal">                              </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergedJumpsT &amp;Jumps,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1252"><Highlight kind="normal">                              MergeTypeT MergeType)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1253"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// This doesn&#39;t depend on the ordering of the nodes</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1254"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> FreqGain = freqBasedLocalityGain(ChainPred, ChainSucc);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1255"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1256"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Merge offset is always 0, as the chains are not split.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1257"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergeOffset = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1258"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergedBlocks =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1259"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a800ced24f890a965660badbbd70800d2">mergeNodes</a>(ChainPred-&gt;Nodes, ChainSucc-&gt;Nodes, MergeOffset, MergeType);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1260"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> DistGain = distBasedLocalityGain(MergedBlocks, Jumps);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1261"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1262"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> GainScore = DistGain + Config.FrequencyScale &#42; FreqGain;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1263"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Scale the result to increase the importance of merging short chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1264"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (GainScore &gt;= 0.0)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1265"><Highlight kind="normal">      GainScore /= std::min(ChainPred-&gt;Size, ChainSucc-&gt;Size);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1266"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1267"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergeGainT(GainScore, MergeOffset, MergeType);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1268"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1269"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1270"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the change of the frequency locality after merging the chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1271"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> freqBasedLocalityGain(ChainT &#42;ChainPred, ChainT &#42;ChainSucc)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1272"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> missProbability = &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChainDensity) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1273"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> PageSamples = ChainDensity &#42; Config.CacheSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1274"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (PageSamples &gt;= TotalSamples)</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1275"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> 0.0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1276"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a> = PageSamples / TotalSamples;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1277"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/apintops/#a883e1be546d0c36c707bc175acedd262">pow</a>(1.0 - <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/option/option-cpp/#a04665169063c8ca1f2ea96c27fc7c2b2">P</a>, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Config.CacheEntries));</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1278"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1279"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1280"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Cache misses on the chains before merging.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1281"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurScore =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1282"><Highlight kind="normal">        ChainPred-&gt;ExecutionCount &#42; missProbability(ChainPred-&gt;density()) +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1283"><Highlight kind="normal">        ChainSucc-&gt;ExecutionCount &#42; missProbability(ChainSucc-&gt;density());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1284"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1285"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Cache misses on the merged chain</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1286"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergedCounts = ChainPred-&gt;ExecutionCount + ChainSucc-&gt;ExecutionCount;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1287"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergedSize = ChainPred-&gt;Size + ChainSucc-&gt;Size;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1288"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergedDensity = </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(MergedCounts) / MergedSize;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1289"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewScore = MergedCounts &#42; missProbability(MergedDensity);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1290"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1291"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurScore - NewScore;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1292"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1293"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1294"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the distance locality for a jump / call.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1295"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> distScore(uint64&#95;t SrcAddr, uint64&#95;t DstAddr, uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1296"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Dist = SrcAddr &lt;= DstAddr ? DstAddr - SrcAddr : SrcAddr - DstAddr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1297"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a> = Dist == 0 ? 0.1 : </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(Dist);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1298"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a845e08be4b0320d66901a66b0c0e9509">Count</a>) &#42; std::pow(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/ir/builtingcs-cpp/#a6a9f043784cf87001c84980afa76da82">D</a>, -Config.DistancePower);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1299"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1300"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1301"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Compute the change of the distance locality after merging the chains.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1302"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> distBasedLocalityGain(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergedNodesT &amp;Nodes,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1303"><Highlight kind="normal">                               </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergedJumpsT &amp;Jumps)</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword"> const </Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">&#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1304"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t CurAddr = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1305"><Highlight kind="normal">    Nodes.forEach(&#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NodeT &#42;Node) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1306"><Highlight kind="normal">      <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;EstimatedAddr = CurAddr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1307"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurAddr += <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;Size;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1308"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1309"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1310"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> CurScore = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1311"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewScore = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1312"><Highlight kind="normal">    Jumps.forEach(&#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> JumpT &#42;Jump) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1313"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t SrcAddr = Jump-&gt;Source-&gt;EstimatedAddr + Jump-&gt;Offset;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1314"><Highlight kind="normal">      uint64&#95;t DstAddr = Jump-&gt;Target-&gt;EstimatedAddr;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1315"><Highlight kind="normal">      NewScore += distScore(SrcAddr, DstAddr, Jump-&gt;ExecutionCount);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1316"><Highlight kind="normal">      CurScore += distScore(0, TotalSize, Jump-&gt;ExecutionCount);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1317"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1318"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> NewScore - CurScore;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1319"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1320"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1321"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Merge chain From into chain Into, update the list of active chains,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1322"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// adjacency information, and the corresponding cached values.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1323"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">void</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> mergeChains(ChainT &#42;Into, ChainT &#42;From, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">size&#95;t</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> MergeOffset,</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1324"><Highlight kind="normal">                   MergeTypeT MergeType) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1325"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Into != From &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;a chain cannot be merged with itself&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1326"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1327"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Merge the nodes.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1328"><Highlight kind="normal">    MergedNodesT MergedNodes =</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1329"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-codelayout-cpp-/#a800ced24f890a965660badbbd70800d2">mergeNodes</a>(Into-&gt;Nodes, From-&gt;Nodes, MergeOffset, MergeType);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1330"><Highlight kind="normal">    Into-&gt;merge(From, MergedNodes.getNodes());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1331"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1332"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Merge the edges.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1333"><Highlight kind="normal">    Into-&gt;mergeEdges(From);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1334"><Highlight kind="normal">    From-&gt;clear();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1335"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1336"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="comment"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1337"><Highlight kind="comment">  /// Concatenate all chains into the final order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1338"><Highlight kind="normal">  std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; concatChains() &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1339"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Collect chains and calculate density stats for their sorting.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1340"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;const ChainT &#42;&gt; SortedChains;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1341"><Highlight kind="normal">    DenseMap&lt;const ChainT &#42;, double&gt; ChainDensity;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1342"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (ChainT &amp;Chain : AllChains) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1343"><Highlight kind="normal">      </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-loadstorevectorizer-cpp-/#afd1adfcbfce320e6265935ce4d6299a3">Chain</a>.Nodes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/smallvectortemplatecommon/#ad9a3c7bc26b130377bbafc170b5f88a2">empty</a>()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1344"><Highlight kind="normal">        SortedChains.push&#95;back(&amp;Chain);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1345"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Using doubles to avoid overflow of ExecutionCounts.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1346"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1347"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ExecutionCount = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1348"><Highlight kind="normal">        </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">for</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (NodeT &#42;Node : <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-loadstorevectorizer-cpp-/#afd1adfcbfce320e6265935ce4d6299a3">Chain</a>.Nodes) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1349"><Highlight kind="normal">          <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> += </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;Size);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1350"><Highlight kind="normal">          ExecutionCount += </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static&#95;cast&lt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordtype">double</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/rdf/#ac54dd04d6e441d1b72195477e5bc1909">Node</a>-&gt;ExecutionCount);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1351"><Highlight kind="normal">        &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1352"><Highlight kind="normal">        <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt; 0 &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;a chain of zero size&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1353"><Highlight kind="normal">        ChainDensity&#91;&amp;<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/anonymous-loadstorevectorizer-cpp-/#afd1adfcbfce320e6265935ce4d6299a3">Chain</a>&#93; = ExecutionCount / <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1354"><Highlight kind="normal">      &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1355"><Highlight kind="normal">    &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1356"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1357"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Sort chains by density in the decreasing order.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1358"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::sort(SortedChains.begin(), SortedChains.end(),</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1359"><Highlight kind="normal">              &#91;&amp;&#93;(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChainT &#42;L, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> ChainT &#42;R) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1360"><Highlight kind="normal">                const double DL = ChainDensity&#91;L&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1361"><Highlight kind="normal">                const double DR = ChainDensity&#91;R&#93;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1362"><Highlight kind="normal">                </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Compare by density and break ties by chain identifiers.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1363"><Highlight kind="normal">                return std::make&#95;tuple(-DL, L-&gt;Id) &lt;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1364"><Highlight kind="normal">                       std::make&#95;tuple(-DR, R-&gt;Id);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1365"><Highlight kind="normal">              &#125;);</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1368"><Highlight kind="normal">    std::vector&lt;uint64&#95;t&gt; Order;</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l01414" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1414"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Verify correctness of the input data.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l01415" /><CodeLine lineNumber="1415"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(NodeCounts.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() == NodeSizes.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref/#a85ffb6531d4cda988ea81f18d4e56fb7">size</a>() &amp;&amp; </Highlight><Highlight kind="stringliteral">&quot;Incorrect input&quot;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">);</Highlight></CodeLine>
